009package imagingbook.common.image.access;
010
011import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
012import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
014import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
015
016/**
017 * Image accessor for scalar images with 8-bit (byte) values.
018 * 
019 * @author WB
020 * @version 2022/09/22
021 */
022public class ByteAccessor extends ScalarAccessor {
023        private final byte[] pixels;
024
025        /**
026         * Constructor. See also the factory method
027         * {@link ScalarAccessor#create(ImageProcessor, OutOfBoundsStrategy, InterpolationMethod)}.
028         * 
029         * @param ip  an instance of {@link ByteProcessor}
030         * @param obs the out-of-bounds strategy to be used (use {@code null} for
031         *            default settings)
032         * @param ipm the interpolation method to be used (use {@code null} for default
033         *            settings)
034         */
035        public ByteAccessor(ByteProcessor ip, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs, InterpolationMethod ipm) {
036                super(ip, obs, ipm);
037                this.pixels = (byte[]) this.ip.getPixels();
038        }
039
040        @Override
041        public float getVal(int u, int v) {
042                final int i = indexer.getIndex(u, v);
043                if (i < 0)
044                        return this.defaultValue;
045                else {
046                        return (0xff & pixels[i]);
047                }
048        }
049
050        @Override
051        public void setVal(int u, int v, float val) {
052                int i = indexer.getIndex(u, v);
053                if (i >= 0) {
054                        int vali = Math.round(val);
055                        if (vali < 0) vali = 0;
056                        if (vali > 255) vali = 255;
057                        pixels[i] = (byte) (0xFF & vali);
058                }
059        }
060}
